-e ---

𓏞 𓏟

𓊃 𓈙 𓏞 𓏝 | write, inscribe | ⲥϧⲁⲓ sxai{b/t} scrit scribe schreib ⇔ script
𓋴 𓐍 𓂋 𓏏 𓍼 𓏤 | roll (of papyrus) | scrit
𓂧 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓇇||papyrus plant|χειρit™ > scrit Schrift script ⇔ write 𓏟
𓂧 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓇇||papyrus plant|cherīd™ > reed 𓇅 3

𓏟 writ ⇔ reed 𓇅 whit 𓌉 𓎘

writer word wtr author utter s'writ script

word ⇔ mwt mot(french) 𓌃 #MD מדע MATTER™ Mata™ math 𓅐𓋬𓋾
MWT￫WRT 𓌃𓂧𓏛𓏥 Wörter, word, writ, warrod 𓌃

Port𓉐 ⇔ Vort : word
